title: Tom Izzo: MSU players will have to defend Magic Johnson statue from 'idiots'
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Tom Izzo: MSU players will have to defend Magic Johnson statue from 'idiots' Michigan State basketball coach Tom Izzo chimes in on the defacing of the on-campus Magic Johnson statue, apparently by Michigan fans.
